cisc3120.chatter

Class ChatterServerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc3120.chatter.ChatterInfo
      • cisc3120.chatter.ChatterServerInfo

  • public class ChatterServerInfo
extends cisc3120.chatter.ChatterInfo
    Contains information needed to start the server. Also sets up the PrintStream and BufferedReader to send and receive messages.
    Author:
    David Lall
